hudson.tasks.Shell.command: rm -rf /tmp/build_mevoco_report.json echo "{\"fields\":[{\"value\":\"build_mevoco - #${BUILD_NUMBER}(triggered by ${TRIGGER})\",\"short\":true},{\"value\":\"Success\",\"short\":true}],\"color\":\"00F300\"}" >> /tmp/build_mevoco_report.json for i in $(seq `wc -l mevoco_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt|awk '{print $1}'`); do COMPONENT=`sed -n "${i}p" mevoco_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt | awk '{print $1}'` SUBJECT=`sed -n "${i}p" mevoco_ci/${BUILD_NUMBER}/versions.txt | awk '{for (i=2; i<NF; i++) printf("%s ",$i);print $i}'` echo "{\"fields\":[{\"value\":\"${COMPONENT}\",\"short\":true},{\"value\":\"${SUBJECT}\",\"short\":true}],\"color\":\"00F300\"}," done echo "{}" >> /tmp/build_mevoco_report.json curl -X POST --data-urlencode "payload={\"username\" : \"jenkins\", \"attachments\" : [`cat /tmp/build_mevoco_report.json`]}" https://hooks.slack.com/services/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
